p: Statistical analyses were performed using Prism 5 (GraphPad, La Jolla, CA, USA). All values were plotted as averages with standard errors of the means. Studentâ€™s t-test, and ANOVA were used to determine the significant differences between two or multiple sets of experimental data, respectively. p Values of * < 0.01, ** < 0.005, and *** < 0.0001 were considered statistically significant.
